com.github.yona168.giraffe.net.messenger

Class ScopedComponent

  • com.github.yona168.giraffe.net.messenger.ScopedComponent
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Messenger, PacketProcessorComponent

    public class ScopedComponent

    A CoroutineScope that gets a new job when it enables, and cancels it when it disables. This blocks the calling thread.

    See Also:
    CoroutineScope

      ScopedComponent()
      A CoroutineScope that gets a new job when it enables, and cancels it when it disables. This blocks the calling thread.
